LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.0.label: buzzed-hidden
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.1.label: опьянение (навеселе)
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.1.description: Я чувствую себя чуточку легче после этого стаканчика. Хорошо...
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.2.label: опьянение (подвыпивший)
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.2.description: Меня немного пошатывает! И это весьма приятно.
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.3.label: опьянение (пьяный)
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.3.description: Я чувствую себя так раскованно и бесстрашно! Это великолепно!
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.4.label: опьянение (сильно пьяный)
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.0.label: похмелье (лёгкое)
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.1.label: похмелье (среднее)
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.1.description: Голова раскалывается от всей той выпивки... Зачем я пил?
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.2.label: похмелье (сильное)
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.2.description: Такое чувство, будто стая гусей клюёт меня в череп.
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.3.label: hungover-hidden
LanguageData.AlcoholWithdrawal.stages.1.label: alcohol withdrawal
LanguageData.AlcoholWithdrawal.stages.1.description: Feeling shaky. Everything pisses me off. I keep thinking of drinking.
LanguageData.GoJuiceHigh.stages.0.label: high on go-juice
LanguageData.GoJuiceHigh.stages.0.description: Feeling pumped but calm. I am the sniper bullet in flight, ready to cut through you.
LanguageData.GoJuiceWithdrawal.stages.1.label: go-juice withdrawal
LanguageData.GoJuiceWithdrawal.stages.1.description: I'm all fuzzy and can't think straight. My limbs feel heavy, I'm tired and hungry, everything hurts. And why won't my eyes focus properly?
LanguageData.FlakeHigh.stages.0.label: high on flake
LanguageData.YayoHigh.stages.0.label: high on yayo
LanguageData.PsychiteWithdrawal.stages.1.label: psychite withdrawal
LanguageData.PsychiteWithdrawal.stages.1.description: God I'm tired. And nothing feels good any more.
LanguageData.SmokeleafHigh.stages.0.label: high on smokeleaf
LanguageData.SmokeleafWithdrawal.stages.1.label: Smokeleaf withdrawal
LanguageData.SmokeleafWithdrawal.stages.1.description: I really wish I could smoke.
LanguageData.WakeUpWithdrawal.stages.1.label: wake-up withdrawal
LanguageData.WakeUpWithdrawal.stages.1.description: I feel all fuzzy and unfocused.
